mapper.sql: customerid, sku, active_flag, addtime, addwho, allocationrule, alternate_sku1, alternate_sku2, alternate_sku3, alternate_sku4, alternate_sku5, cube, defaulthold, defaultreceivinguom, defaultshipmentuom, descr_c, descr_e, edittime, editwho, firstinbounddate, grossweight, firstop, inboundlifedays, lotid, netweight, onestepallocation, outboundlifedays, overrcvpercentage, overreceiving, packid, price, putawayrule, qtymax, qtymin, replenishrule, reservecode, reservedfield01, reservedfield02, reservedfield03, reservedfield04, reservedfield05, reservedfield06, reservedfield07, reservedfield08, reservedfield09, reservedfield10, reservedfield11, reservedfield12, reservedfield13, reservedfield14, reservedfield15, reservedfield16, reservedfield17, reservedfield18, rotationid, skuhigh, skulength, skuwidth, sku_group1, sku_group2, sku_group3, sku_group4, sku_group5, sku_group6, sku_group7, sku_group8, sku_group9, softallocationrule, tare

where 1=1
and customerid like '%${condition.customerid}%'
and sku like '%${condition.sku}%'
and active_flag like '%${condition.activeFlag}%'
and addtime >= #{condition.addTimeStart}
and #{condition.addTimeEnd} >= addtime
and edittime >= #{condition.edittimeStart}
and #{condition.edittimeEnd} >= edittime
and addwho like '%${condition.addwho}%'
and descr_c like '%${condition.descrC}%'
and descr_e like '%${condition.descrE}%'
and edittime like '%${condition.edittime}%'
and editwho like '%${condition.editwho}%'
and firstop like '%${condition.firstop}%'
and packid like '%${condition.packid}%'
and reservedfield01 like '%${condition.reservedfield01}%'
and reservedfield02 like '%${condition.reservedfield02}%'
and reservedfield03 like '%${condition.reservedfield03}%'
and sku_group1 like '%${condition.sku_group1}%'
and sku_group2 like '%${condition.sku_group2}%'

mapper.update: update Bas_Sku set active_flag=#{activeFlag}, alternate_sku1=#{alternateSku1}, alternate_sku2=#{alternateSku2}, alternate_sku3=#{alternateSku3}, cube=#{cube}, descr_c=#{descrC}, descr_e=#{descrE}, edittime=#{edittime}, editwho=#{editwho}, grossweight=#{grossweight}, packid=#{packid}, price=#{price}, reservedfield01=#{reservedfield01}, reservedfield02=#{reservedfield02}, reservedfield03=#{reservedfield03} where customerid=upper(#{customerid}) and sku=upper(#{sku})

update Bas_Sku set
active_flag=#{activeFlag},
alternate_sku1=#{alternateSku1},
alternate_sku2=#{alternateSku2},

where customerid=#{customerid} and sku=#{sku}
mapper.delete: delete from Bas_Sku where customerid = upper(#{customerid}) and sku = upper(#{sku})
mapper.select: select from Bas_Sku where customerid = upper(#{customerid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) and sku = upper(#{sku,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

select
from Bas_Sku
order by customerid,sku

select customerid,sku,alternate_sku1,packid,cube,grossweight,price from ( select customerid, sku, alternate_sku1, packid, ifnull(cube,0) * #{qty,jdbcType=NUMERIC} as cube, ifnull(grossweight,0) * #{qty,jdbcType=NUMERIC} as grossweight, ifnull(price,0) * #{qty,jdbcType=NUMERIC} as price from Bas_Sku where customerid=upper(#{customerid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) and sku=upper(#{sku,jdbcType=VARCHAR})) t
